Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MusicCallback
    Interface that defines the functionalities for a callback related to music (songs) Implemented when there is a need to update table contents in the case of a specific event
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicInfoSong
    This class is a simplified version of the Song class.
    Config
    Config class defines the structure of the configuration file.
    ConnectorDB
    Class for connecting to the MYSQL localhost database, where the songs and users will be stored (in the server's case)
    Song
    This class is used to store information (id, name, file, user code, and if the song is private or public) of a song.
    SongDAO
    This class manages all the connections to the database in order get, delete and update information about the songs table of the database.
    Statistics
    This class is used to store the statistics and contains a date, number of songs played, total number of minutes.
    User
    This class is used to store information (id, nickname, email, password) of a user
    UserDAO
    this class's main purpose is to connect to the database and get User objects.
